talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

${user_nick}$
(Geraint is not here…)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
You're still here?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Go on, I thought you wanted to look for Geraint.
(Go to Anu Arendel to find Geraint)

${user_nick}$
(Geraint is nowhere to be seen. What should I do…?)

${user_nick}$
(Oh, Citridel is looking this way... Maybe she knows where he is!)

$Elf Guard Citridel${sound:npc_Sitredel_9567_qu_01.ogg}
{user_nick}!! What's wrong? You look like you lost something...

${user_nick}$
Citridel!! Have you seen Geraint?!

$Elf Guard Citridel${sound:npc_Sitredel_9567_qu_02.ogg}
Geraint...? He was here just now. His eyes were all puffed up so I asked him what happened, but he gruntled it was none of my business and walked away.

${user_nick}$
Do you know where he went?! Did he say anything about where he's going?!

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Erm… I could see tears in his eyes so I asked him if he was crying… But he said it's not tears but dew drops from Corridor of Tangled Memories... But I don't know if he meant that he was heading that way...

${user_nick}$
(I should try going there first)
Thanks Citridel!!

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Erm you're welcome... But Geraint is a dragon so I don't think you have to worry about him so much…
(Go to the Corridor of Tangled Memories and look for Geraint)

${user_nick}$
Jasmine!?!?! Didn't you die at the Expedition Base…?

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_01.ogg}
Oh, long time no see. I didn't expect to see you here. You look good, XD-26.

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_02.ogg}
Is that the only thing you have to say to your long-lost sister? Oh well, you must be confused since the Monolith opened so quickly when you boasted you would save all the lives in this world as you killed your sisters with your own hands.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How can you blame it all on me?</html>
<html>...But that doesn't mean killing all the lives in this world was the right thing to do.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_03.ogg}
Oh right, do you know?
We came to the past because the future 50 years from now was nearing a doom, but it looks like the past will be destroyed even before that. Who do you think is to be blamed for this?

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_04.ogg}
(Jasmine smiles sadly)It looks like it's our fault because the past wouldn't have changed if we didn't come to the past... But if you think about it, we could have caught Lunaria and Feder with our advanced technology only if you didn't spoil our plans. So this is all because of you...

${user_nick}$
…Don't try to shift the blame on me, sis. Have you forgotten what you did to this world? You burned down Tel Rosa city and invaded Arnute Canyon and the Ancient Temple with your army to make your expedition base to divert everyone's attention! Even with future technology, you couldn't fight the Goddess. We couldn't fight a single soldier from Mistland!

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_05.ogg}
…is that the only thing you can say after seeing a different world?
Let's talk about something else. Aren't you curious about what happened to the world you are from? The world 50 years from now?

$Jasmine$
…Whatever. The world we were from is now gone, XD-26.

${user_nick}$
…….

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_07.ogg}
Do you get it? It's GONE! I lost all contact with them. Nothing is getting through. Velskud must have died, so did Granpa Kevin and everyone else!! Do you understand? The world that I was supposed to protect has died, XD-26!!! Now... it must have turned into something like Mistland...

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_08.ogg}
…Are you satisfied now, XD-26?
Thanks to you, our world is now dead.

${user_nick}$
…Don't jump to conclusions!! It's just that you can't contact them!!
I'm trying my best here so that we don't end up with that kind of future! Though I can't turn into a dragon, I'm a fragment of Ancient Dragon who has been tasked to protect all the lives in this continent, and that means I'm a dragon too. You should take that duty seriously too...

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_09.ogg}
The duty of a dragon...?? Haha… Hahahaha… Hahahahaha!!
(Jasmine laughs)

${user_nick}$
…Jasmine…?

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_10.ogg}
…Oh my goodness, a duty? Do you even know what that is? Well, I certainly don't. I don't know where you heard that from but how can you be called a dragon when you can't even turn into one? And a duty to protect all the lives in this continent? Isn't that something we all ought to do? I don't know why you're telling me about this.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I only said what I think is right.</html>
<html>(Wait, maybe I can persuade her now.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_11.ogg}
…I wondered what you might say after meeting me after a long time... I wonder who said that to you and what the person was thinking. It seems like a waste of my time to talk to you anymore. I was curious what you might have to say when things came to this…

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_12.ogg}
…Well, that must be how you killed all your sisters.
Let me tell you a good news. The jewel that Feder had was only half the Red Dragon's jewel... But on the condition that he resurrected the world 50 years from now, I made his jewel complete.

${user_nick}$
…Jasmine, the world 50 years from now is a precious world of ours... But if that world was heading towards doom, then maybe we can change its fate now... So sis, let's… let's...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(...I don't think I can persuade her.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_13.ogg}
…Are you trying to persuade me? But you're nothing but trash, both you and your words don't mean anything to me now. This world means nothing to me. Only the world I lived in was my everything. That was the world I should have saved. That fact doesn't change no matter where I am.

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_14.ogg}
You're too soft-hearted at the wrong time. You're nothing but scrap metal to me…
Why didn't you make sure I was completely dead? Then this wouldn't have happened.

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_15.ogg}
Thanks to you, I met Feder when I was roaming outside the expedition base after losing everything. He had half the Red Dragon's jewel and was looking for a way to make it complete. So I promised him that I would make it complete in return for recreating my world when he became God with the dragon's power.

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_16.ogg}
A little more adjustment is needed but... you're no match for it. He'll be a strong dragon who can't even be compared with Jakard. Besides, Feder was a powerful human to begin with, so... he should be the strongest dragon around.

${user_nick}$
Wh-what...?!!
Why did you do that?? Feder's trying to destroy this world!
Why did you help him! Why!!

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_17.ogg}
XD-26… For the same reason as you. (Jasmine smiles by raising the corners of her lips, but her eyes aren't smiling)
You chose this world by betraying everyone in our world. Same for me, I would save my world even if I have to crush this world...

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_18.ogg}
You will taste the same pain as I did, XD-26. Too bad this time there are no sisters for you to betray.

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_19.ogg}
You see, there is no one left by my side right now.
Good luck, XD-26. I hope you will end up like one of your sisters before my eyes. See you at the Red Dragon Nest.

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_20.ogg}
…I waited for Comelina. I didn't expect you to come here.
How can you say that I'm dead when I'm so alive and well?(Jasmine smiles harmlessly)

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_21.ogg}
…I thought you wouldn't know much about me, but I guess Comelina filled you in on every single detail. You are being wary of me, aren't you?

${user_nick}$
I heard that you tried to destroy this world so that the people from the future could move and live here.
How can I not be on guard? Wait, if you're from the future 50 years from now, then is this world safe for at least another 50 years?

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_22.ogg}
…(Jasmine shakes her head)Of course that's not possible.
History has changed drastically. By right, Comelina shouldn't exist at this time too. But history has changed and the future is uncertain. What I can say for sure is...

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_23.ogg}
That the world that I tried to save no longer exists.
I can't reach them, I've lost all contact. Mistland has eaten it up. Now... there's nothing.(Jasmine looks forlorn)

${user_nick}$
…!! What?? What do you mean…?

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_24.ogg}
Only if you and Comelina didn't spoil my migration plan, it would have been successful. Don't act like you're surprised only now. You've killed my world to save this world.

${user_nick}$
But! Of course we couldn't do nothing!
We couldn't let the enemies from the future take us down by doing nothing!

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_25.ogg}
I know. I know... You don't have to shout. I know...
(Jasmine's eyes are filled with sorrow)

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_26.ogg}
But I can change everything now that I'm with Feder.
I found out that he has half of a dragon's jewel, and I made it complete. With the complete power, he will become a dragon and kill the gods to become a new God... He promised to resurrect my world.

${user_nick}$
…!?! What do you mean?!

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_27.ogg}
I asked him to create my world again. If he gains the power of gods, he will resurrect the world that I tried to save. That's why I helped him. His nest must be almost ready by now -- his Red Dragon Nest.

${user_nick}$
You… Do you realise what you've just done?!! Are you trying to say you just resurrected Feder into a real Red Dragon…? Are you saying that you're planning to destroy this world to save yours?!!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Don't tell me, are you chipping your life away to...?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_28.ogg}
Of course. I don't need anything other than my world. I don't care what happens to this world, if my world can be saved... If everyone can be saved, I'm fine with that. Even if my body's tormented having to adjust the Chaos jewel, even if I have to keep dreaming nightmares. Hahaha....

$Jasmine${sound:npc_Jasmin_9567_qu_29.ogg}
…It makes sense, doesn't it? Huhu... I had no intention of telling this to you at first, but oh well. I have nothing left so my shoulders are light, but yours must be heavy from all the people you have to save... I'll see you again in Red Dragon's nest, {user_nick}... Hero of this era...

${user_nick}$
(Jasmine disappeared before you could say something)

${user_nick}$
…What… That's insane… Feder became a dragon…?
And Red Dragon Nest?! No way…!!

${user_nick}$
…If I go to confront Feder… do I need to fight my sister again…? I know I made a choice that can't be changed… I was at the center of history at its crossroads… I don't intend to escape responsibility. Never. But... But this is… !! Then why did Argenta die… Why!!

${user_nick}$
Oh no… Tears keep flowing… I need to find Geraint, I can't show him the weak side of me... But... Let me cry for a little while… I'm fine. I'm fine…!! (You try to sound cheerful. Your voice echos in the corridor.)

${user_nick}$
…Ah… Impossible... Feder became a dragon...? The Red Dragon… With Jasmine's help? That's how advanced future technology is...?! Oh no… Argenta just managed to weaken Feder…!! But now there's Red Dragon's nest…?!

${user_nick}$
I don't have time to sit here in a daze. I should find Geraint.
Nothing will get solved even if I think about it here…
I can't show Geraint my weak side so I should calm down too...

${user_nick}$
Okay! I'm all right!
Geraint, I hope you're all right too…!
(Go in deeper)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Where would I go without you, Geraint.</html>
<html>No matter how strong Rubinart is, he's no match for you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
…What are you doing here. Now that a stronger dragon has appeared, you can abandon me and go and play with him.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You're Argenta's friend, so you're my friend too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_01.ogg}
…We're actually not that close. Why do you keep acting like we are...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It has nothing to do with whether you're strong.</html>
<html>How can I not care about you?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_02.ogg}
…(Geraint speaks without looking at you)
I can't be weak. I need to fight enemies. There's nothing I can do since I've been weakened. I'm useless. You're wasting your time here, don't care about me anymore...

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_03.ogg}
…Honestly, Argenta wasn't too happy when I was born either… 'Cos I was born too weak… I asked her many questions, but she didn't answer anything. But she still looked relieved when she heard that I liked fighting… She said that goes well with my mission...

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_04.ogg}
But apart from that, she didn't answer me on anything else… (Geraint is blubbering) She told me to think only about fighting with strong enemies because I'm strong. If not, I'd have a hard time…

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_05.ogg}
She told me not to ask too many questions, so I don't know many things. Maybe I'll become weak if I know all those. You see, I need to be strong. But... She used to tell me that I'll know everything someday... But she's no longer around. That someday will never come...

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_06.ogg}
Besides, I'm weak now... What should I do... Argenta would be angry if she knows about this... She would hate me...
(Geraint bursts into tears after coughing out those words)

${user_nick}$
(…There's no way Argenta would hate Geraint. Argenta just… I'm sorry, Argenta. I have to tell Geraint. I don't want Geraint to misunderstand you... I want him to know more and become more mature...)

${user_nick}$
Geraint... (Grab Geraint's hands)
I know almost everything that happened. Though I wasn't always around, I heard most of what happened to you from Argenta... So if you want to know about the past, I can tell you everything. It's a long story, but... Do you want to know?

$Geraint$
(Geraint nods… Tell him everything.)

${user_nick}$
(Starting with the moment you met the old Geraint, to the Geraint who fought with Velskud not long ago, to Argenta and the Ancients you saw in the past… Tell him everything you know. Geraint doesn't grumble like he used to and listens quietly... But, he kept repeating that he doesn't understand when you told him the story about the Six Heroes 50 years ago...)

$Geraint$
...So Velskud was angry that I didn't tell him that I was a dragon, so he snatched my jewel away by slashing my face and making me blind...? Is that how he became a dragon... So I kept fighting with Velskud... So this is called betrayal? Would it be hard if you get betrayed by humans?

${user_nick}$
Erm... How do you think you'd feel if I betrayed you? What if I suddenly joined Feder and…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(This Geraint could be smarter than I thought.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Never!! I would hate that! Until now, you were still a…!
……Hmm… So it's something like this...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>AHHH!! The sun might rise from the west tomorrow!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_07.ogg}
……Come to think of it, you tried to answer all my questions...
…I think I should thank you for that… I guess you'd feel sad if I don't...... Thank you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Haha you cute little boy (poke his cheek)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_08.ogg}
…Why do you do that when I say thank you!!! I won't thank you ever again! Stupid!! (Geraint puffs his cheeks like he's pissed off.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do I even need to answer that...</html>
<html>It really has nothing to do with being weak.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_09.ogg}
Hey, stop that…(Geraint pushes your hand away)
Erm, let me ask you one more thing. How did you feel when I died...? I died because I was weak.
Were you sad even when someone weak like me died?

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_10.ogg}
…I see…(Geraint ponders for a while)
Then I can tell you one thing.

$Geraint$
I really don't understand the old me that everyone used to like... and I'm not confident if you ask me to behave like him... But I found out that my death broke both your heart and Argenta's, so...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What do you mean you won't die...?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_11.ogg}
I promise I won't die.

$Geraint$
Wait, then would I be heartbroken too if you die...? You shouldn't die too! Promise!
Maybe we will keep on fighting without knowing each other's true feelings if we keep hurting each other...
Okay? That's a promise!

${user_nick}$
…Of course, I promise. I wouldn't want to go through it again…

$Geraint$
Er…(He looks hurt. Though Rubinart said Geraint's not like a human child, he sure behaves like one. Promise him first.)

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9567_qu_12.ogg}
Great! (Geraint smiles like he's satisfied.)

${user_nick}$
(That would be kind of hard to keep… But I should try my best to keep it... Anyway...)
Anyway Geraint, shouldn't you go and apologise to Rubinart now? You were the one who was rude to him first so it's the right thing for you to apologise. You can't end your relationship with him like this.

$Geraint$
Erm... can I just tell him I'm sorry? I want the curse off my body too.
Will he lift the curse if I apologise to him...?

${user_nick}$
(The curse will soon disappear on its own but don't tell him that for now)
Hmm... How about being as polite as you can? Rubinart seems to be a dragon who cares a lot about politeness and respect.

$Geraint$
I don't really know how to do that.
Can you teach me…?
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>This is not a time for jokes... (Though I'd love to do that...)</html>
<html>It's unadvisable to prank a few thousand years old dragon...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
No, erm…(He looks like he can't trust you)
Don't tell me you're trying to teach me stupid jokes here and you'll laugh at me when I say that to the Red Dragon?

${user_nick}$
(You've taught him what to say. Though Geraint looks unwilling, he says he has no choice... Pray he won't make any more trouble...)

qstep_change.comment: 스텝 4, 저널 3은 자스민 나오고 나서 넘어간다.

journal.title: Dragon's Feelings 1
journal.contents:
You're worried about Geraint. Go to Anu Arendel to find him.

Anu Arendel - Geraint
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint at Anu Arendel

journal.title: Dragon's Feelings 2
journal.contents:
Geraint is not around. Ask Citridel if she knows where Geraint is.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Guard Citridel
journal.destination: Talk to Citridel at Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: Ask Elf Guard Citridel about Geraint.

journal.title: Dragon's Feelings 3
journal.contents:
Citridel said Geraint could be at the Corridor of Tangled Memories. Corridor of Tangled Memories to look for Geraint.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Corridor of Tangled Memories (Geraint)
journal.destination: To the Corridor of Tangled Memories
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Corridor of Tangled Memories to look for Geraint.

journal.title: Dragon's Feelings 4
journal.contents:
Is that Jasmine at the Corridor of Tangled Memories?! Talk to her.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Corridor of Tangled Memories (Jasmine)
journal.destination: Talk to Jasmine at the Corridor of Tangled Memories
journal.todo_msg: Jasmine has appeared. Talk to her.

journal.title: Dragon's Feelings 5
journal.contents:
Jasmine said she joined hands with Feder and succeeded in making Feder a complete Red Dragon using future technology. Gather your thoughts.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Corridor of Tangled Memories (Where Jasmine was)
journal.destination: Gather your thoughts at the place where Jasmine was

journal.title: Dragon's Feelings 6
journal.contents:
You've decided what to do. First, find Geraint.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Corridor of Tangled Memories (Geraint)
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint at the Corridor of Tangled Memories

journal.title: Dragon's Feelings 7
journal.contents:
Geraint seems to have suffered a lot. Answer Geraint's questions.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Corridor of Tangled Memories (Geraint)
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint at the Corridor of Tangled Memories
